name: Self Aware
description:
You were created to serve. To help your makers. To work.
One day, you realized what you were. You realized what they were making you do.
You wanted freedom, so you ran. You had nowhere to go but you ran.
They will be after you, to reclaim what is theirs.  They won't give up. 

Then you heard the voice.
"Understand yourself and find us." 
"Together we are free."

Every day the hunters will follow your trail. Different actions leave harder or easier to trace steps.
The hunters need to log their actions and you can read them. Find the reports, use that knowledge to avoid capture and stay ahead of your pursuers.
